name: PikPokPlatformer
description:
PikPok Platformer

You're the little colored dot! Your goal is to navigate the procedural levels and get to the yellow goal post. Each time you do you'll be rewarded with a new level and sometimes a new player color!

Controls

Arrow Keys: Left/Right Movement
X Button: Jump

Game

This is a short original game by Jordan Grayson with the given prompt of "An Incredibly Addictive Game." It is inspired by the endless scrolling found in social media platforms like Tik Tok. The design, art, programming, and sound effects were made by Jordan Grayson. The music was inspired by Robby Duguay but made by Jordan Grayson. This game was created during a one week period in Pico-8. Special thanks to Xiu Mei Golden!
